Detailed Description

GNOME Power Preferences.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
Note:
Taken in part from: GNOME Tutorial, example 1 http://www.gnome.org/~newren/tutorials/ developing-with-gnome/html/apd.html
This is the main g-p-m module, responsible for loading the glade file, populating and disabling widgets, and writing out configuration to gconf.

Definition in file gpm-prefs.c.
